dmca.title: Blind Date?
dmca.body:
To: Easydate Limited

Dear Sirs

We act for DatingDirect.com Limited of 38a George Street, Birmingham B3 1QA. Our client has been trading under the names "Dating Direct" and "DatingDirect.com" via a website at that domain since January 1999. Our client is a major player in online dating and currently has about 950,000 active members.

Our client spends a large sum on marketing. For example, it spent approximately
